title: Workshop on Productive Failure-Based Project Design for Improving Collaborative Problem-Solving Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of foundational educational theories and experience in designing project-based lessons
context.additional_context: Pre-service teachers practice designing elementary science project lessons in mobile environments while learning to apply productive failure strategies

learning_goals: Learners can systematically integrate productive failure strategies into project-based learning designs.
Develop at least three activities that promote collaborative problem-solving in mobile microlearning environments
Design an assessment rubric that encourages learners' creative failure and supports reflective growth
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
